mapper.update:
update DH_TASK_EXCEPTION
TASK_TYPE = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_RETRY_TIME = #{lastRetryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ERROR_MESSAGE = #{errorMessage,jdbcType=CLOB},
where TASK_UID = #{taskUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update DH_TASK_EXCEPTION set TASK_TYPE = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_RETRY_TIME = #{lastRetryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ERROR_MESSAGE = #{errorMessage,jdbcType=CLOB} where TASK_UID = #{taskUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
